targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%' OR a.description like '%VMem%')
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%' OR a.description like '%VMem%')
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${VCPU_COST} as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)*${VMEM_COST}/(1000*1000) as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

panels.title: Scoped information Efficiency / Performance Actions Summary

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%' OR a.description like '%VMem%')
AND  a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%' OR a.description like '%VMem%')
AND  a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%') 
AND  a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'

ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VMem%')
AND  a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VCPU%')
AND  a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  a.description as "Description"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
(a.description like '%VMem%')
AND  a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%'
AND  a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%'
AND  a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%'
AND  a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float as "Difference",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%'
AND  a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${VCPU_COST} as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%'
AND  a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)*${VMEM_COST}/(1000*1000) as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%'
AND  a.category = 'EFFICIENCY_IMPROVEMENT'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)*${VCPU_COST} as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VCPU%'
AND  a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)*${VMEM_COST}/(1000*1000) as "Cost",
  a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit' as "Unit"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE' AND
a.description like '%VMem%'
AND  a.category = 'PERFORMANCE_ASSURANCE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

SELECT
  DISTINCT e."name" as "VM Name",
--  a.recommendation_time,
  CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN 'VCPU'
    ELSE 'VMEM'
    END as "Resource",
  CASE WHEN ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float) > 0 OR ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float) > 0
    THEN 1::integer
    ELSE -1::integer
    END as "Direction",
  CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float
    ELSE (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float
    END as "Difference",
  CASE WHEN a.description like '%VCPU%'
    THEN a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'unit'
    ELSE a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'unit'
    END as "Unit",
   a.category as "Action Type"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on a.target_entity_id = e."oid"
join scope s on s.scoped_oid = e.oid AND s.seed_oid IN (${GROUP_OID:sqlstring}) and s.finish > now()
where
a."type" = 'RESIZE' AND
e.environment = 'ON_PREM' AND
e."type" = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
ORDER BY "VM Name"

list.definition:
select name
from entity e 
where e."type" = 'GROUP'
and attrs->'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and e.last_seen > now()
order by name
list.label: Group Name
list.name: GROUP_NAME
list.query:
select name
from entity e 
where e."type" = 'GROUP'
and attrs->'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and e.last_seen > now()
order by name

list.definition:
select oid from entity e
where e."type" = 'GROUP'
and e.attrs->'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and e.last_seen > now()
and e.name IN (${GROUP_NAME:sqlstring})
order by e.name
list.label: Group OID
list.name: GROUP_OID
list.query:
select oid from entity e
where e."type" = 'GROUP'
and e.attrs->'member_types' ? 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
and e.last_seen > now()
and e.name IN (${GROUP_NAME:sqlstring})
order by e.name

title: On-Prem: Pending Resize Actions Summary by VM Group with Costs
